testcase.name: user could create new account with valid data (positive scenario)
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user go to register page................................................passed When user select gender.....................................................passed And user enter valid firstname "khaled" and "ramadan" lastname..............passed And user choose date of birth day "2" month "March" year "1992".............passed And user enter valid email..................................................passed And mark on Newletters checkbox.............................................passed And user enter password "P@ssw0rd" & confirm password "P@ssw0rd"............passed And user click on Register btn..............................................passed Then new account is created successfully....................................passed

testcase.name: user could login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user go to login page...................................................passed When user enter valid email and password in login page......................passed And user click on loginBtn..................................................passed

testcase.name: user could login with invalid credentials
